charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1)(A)(i); 18:3551 et seq.-Possession with intent to distribute heroin, a Sch I narcotic drug controlled substance. (1)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant pleaded guilty to ct. of indictment. Remaining cts. dismissed on govt's motion. Defendant assessed $50.00. The defendant is hereby committed to the custody of the U.S. Bureau of Prisons for a term of fifteen 915) months. Upon release from imprisonment, the defendant shall be on supervised release for a term of four (4) yrs. (1)

charges.charge_description: 18:924(c)(1) and 3551 et seq.-Deft carried a firearm during and in relation to a drug trafficking crime. (2)
18:922 (k). 924(a)(1)(B) and 3551 et seq.-Possessed a firearm which had the manufacturer's serial number removed. (3)
T.21 U.S.C. 841(a)(1)-DID KNOWINGLY AND INTENTIONALLY POSSESS WITH INTENT TO DISTRIBUTE HEROIN. [1:94-m-57]
